# Models

Documentation for data models and configuration schemas.

## Default Configuration

class DefaultConfig(*, verbose: bool = False)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

verbose: bool
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

load_default_config() → ConfigFile[source]

Loads, validates, and fills defaults for the default configuration.
